tool.name: Restart
tool.displayname: Restart - clear out existing project info

param.name: maps
param.displayname: Delete ag assessment maps and layouts?
param.dialogReference: Optionally delete all maps and layouts associated with each delineated parcel

param.name: output_folder
param.dialogReference: Optionally delete the output folder provided by the user in the delineate step

param.name: workspace
param.displayname: Delete all feature feature classes in workspace: G:\GIS\Reya\tmp\MyProasdfsdfject\MyProasdfsdfject.gdb?
param.dialogReference:
Optionally clear out the entire workspace

Warning - this does not discriminate between ag assessment feature classes and other feature classes and will delete anything in the workspace.

tool.summary: This tool allows the user to selectively clear out data from the workspace, user specified output folder, and maps and layout data.

idCitation.resTitle: Restart - clear out existing project info
